OOC: OK, you know this, I know this, the player of Megatron knows 
this. However, DarkMouse is unaware of this new Megatron on the 
planet. She doesn't know that the orginal Megatron is gone. But if 
you wish, she will gain this knowlage and move on. *sighs* Well, 
there goes one plot line.   J/K.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> You got the wrong Megatron there, Logo :-)
> 
> The Megs on the planet is G1 Megs. BW Megs died a long time ago. He 
went down in a rather large base explosion, followed by alot of 
arguments and moding accusations back and forth from member to member.
> 
> Oh, and I forgot to say: welcome back!
>
